name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VidFlex - Flexible speed control for all videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide users with the ability to adjust the playback speed of HTML5 videos on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VidFlex is a powerful Chrome extension that allows users to easily control the playback speed of HTML5 videos across a wide variety of websites. Whether you’re watching YouTube, streaming on Netflix, or browsing other video platforms, VidFlex offers a simple and intuitive way to increase or decrease video speed to fit your needs.

With VidFlex, you can fine-tune video playback speeds from 0.25x to 4x, giving you the flexibility to watch videos at your own pace. It supports keyboard shortcuts, enabling quick and seamless adjustments without needing to navigate any menus. This extension is perfect for anyone looking to save time by speeding up educational videos, tutorials, or even binge-watching shows, or for those who want to slow down videos to catch every detail.

Key Features:

▪️ Wide Compatibility: Works on nearly all websites with HTML5 video players.
▪️ Flexible Speed Control: Adjust the speed from 0.25x to 4x with easy keyboard shortcuts.
▪️ No Interruptions: Make changes to the speed during playback without pausing or buffering.
▪️ User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive, with no technical knowledge required.
▪️ Customizable Shortcuts: Easily configure your preferred keyboard keys for speed control.

VidFlex is the ideal extension for anyone who wants complete control over their video-watching experience. Save time, study more efficiently, or simply enjoy videos at your own pace—VidFlex has you covered.
